channel.title: Hammer Decal Problem
channel.description:
Alright, so I just started getting a really weird problem with hammer. Every time I place certain decals (lambda sign, trash, overall about half of them) in my map, they end up tiled four times. This doesn't happen anywhere else, and doesn't happen if I delete my whole map, which is obviously a less than optimal solution.
Any ideas what the hell is going on?

item.title: Hammer Decal Problem
item.dc:creator: Someonerandm
item.description:
Apparently it’s only in hammer, compiled maps don’t have this problem. Weird, but ah well.

Read full topic
